p: This study was conducted in the emergency department of a University Hospital (Grenoble Alpes University Hospital, France). At the time of writing, this hospital is the reference center for pulmonary and infectious diseases for a population of approximately 450,000 inhabitants and the Emergency Department is visited by approximately 65,000 people each year. Three other emergency departments receive low-acuity patients within the study area. Separate, dedicated facilities are available for obstetric, gynecological and pediatric emergencies.
